title: StarCraft 2: DRG's RAVAGER RUSH at 3:00 Minutes vs ByuN! (Best-of-5)
excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and DRG (Zerg). Some solid macro games, and some cheesy matches and plenty of mistakes.
